level.heading: Saving clause.
level.text: Any violation of any provision of law or regulation issued hereunder which is repealed by this chapter and any liability arising under such provisions or regulations may, if the violation occurred or the liability arose prior to such repeal, be prosecuted to the same extent as if this chapter had not been enacted.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.
